content: विधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To do, make, bring about, effect, accomplish, perform, cause, produce, occasion; यथाक्रमं पुंसवनादिकाः क्रिया धृतेश्च धीरः सदृशीर्व्यधत्त सः <ls>R. 3. 10</ls>; तन्नो देवा विधेयासुः <ls>Bk. 19. 2</ls>; विधेयासुर्देवाः परमरमणीयां परिणतिं <ls>Māl. 6. 7</ls>; प्रायः शुभं च विदधात्यशुभं च जंतोः सर्वंकषा भगवती भवितव्यतैव <ls n="Māl.">1. 23</ls>; ये द्वे कालं विधत्तः <ls>Ś. 1. 1</ls> ‘cause, produce, or regulate time’; तस्य तस्याचलां श्रद्धां तामेव विदधाम्यहं <ls>Bg. 7. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 38</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 66</ls>, <ls>Ve. 1. 1</ls>, <ls>Ki. 1. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">16. 62</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">18. 28</ls>; (these senses may be further modified according to the noun with which विधा is used; <ab>cf.</ab> कृ). {@--2@} To lay down, ordain, prescribe, fix, settle, command, enjoin; प्राङ्नाभिवर्धनात्पुंसो जातकर्म विधीयते <ls>Ms. 2. 29</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 19</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 72</ls>; शूद्रस्य तु सवर्णैव नान्या भार्या विधीयते <ls>Ms. 9. 157</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 118</ls>; पाणिनिश्च क्रियाफलस्य कर्तृगामित्वे सत्यात्मनेपदं विदधाति <ls>J. N. V.</ls> {@--3@} To make, form, shape, create, manufacture; तं वेधा विदधे नूनं सहाभूतसमाधिना <ls>R. 1. 29</ls>; अंगानि चंपकदलैः स विधाय नूनं कांते कथं घटितवानुपलेन चेतः <ls>Ś. Til. 3.</ls> {@--4@} To appoint, depute (as a minister). {@--5@} To put on, wear; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--6@} To fix upon, direct towards (as mind &c.); योगे धैर्यसमाधिसिद्धिसुलभे बुद्धिं विधद्ध्वं बुधाः <ls>Bh. 3. 54</ls>, <ls>Bg. 2. 44.</ls> {@--7@} To arrange, put in order. {@--8@} To make ready, prepare. {@--9@} To settle, fix, establish. {@--10@} To give, grant; <ls>Ki. 14. 10.</ls> {@--11@} To procure, furnish. {@--12@} To place, put, lay.
विधा {@--1@} Mode, manner, form. {@--2@} Kind, sort. {@--3@} Prosperity, affluence. {@--4@} The food of elephants, horses &c. {@--5@} Penetration. {@--6@} Hire, wages. {@--7@} Act, action.
